20101222061943.000|20101222061946.000|CC1|INDIVIDUALS OR CONSUMERS HAVE   
20101222061946.000|20101222061951.000|CC1|FREE AND UNFETTERED ACCESS TO   
20101222061951.000|20101222061951.000|CC1|INFORMATION ONLINE.             
20101222061951.000|20101222061953.000|CC1|NOW, THAT IS ALREADY OCCURRING  
20101222061953.000|20101222061954.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW.                      
20101222061954.000|20101222061956.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE COMPLETE FREEDOM TO  
20101222061956.000|20101222061959.000|CC1|DO WHATEVER WE WANT WITH THE

20101222061959.000|20101222062002.000|CC1|BUT THE FCC WANTS TO REGULATE   
20101222062002.000|20101222062005.000|CC1|OUR ACCESS TO THE INTERNET ON   
20101222062005.000|20101222062006.000|CC1|MOBILE PHONES BECAUSE THEY
